name: gfycat-companion-for-firefox
description: gfycat tools for Firefox. Icon by gfycat.com
author: Thomas Andersen<thomas@mr-andersen.no>

preferences.name: showVideoInsteadOfGif
preferences.title: Show video instead of gif
preferences.description: When requesting a gif link, show video instead of the gif

preferences.name: resImageViewerSupport
preferences.title: RES: Enable video conversion in RES's image viewer
preferences.description: Replaces gifs in the RES image viewer with gfycat videos.
